learning_objective: Document design decisions using text, graphics, presentations, and/or demonstrations in the development of complex programs.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is developing a program that generates a user-defined geometric shape. What kinds of design decisions might they have to document in their work?",
    "Answer1": "The color and size of the shape.",
    "Answer2": "The user interface and expected user input.",
    "Answer3": "The algorithms and data structures used.",
    "Answer4": "All of the above.",
    "CorrectAnswer": "4",
    "Explanation": "Alex would need to document all these aspects of the program. This would include user-interface decisions (like how the user specifies their shape), algorithmic decisions (how the shape is generated), and data-structure decisions (how the characteristics of the shape are stored)."
}
